name: Charm School Of Girls
description:
Charm School Of Girls is a fun-filled beauty princess etiquette testing game.
Mary always dreamed of becoming a Princess. She now has the chance to join the Charm School and learn how to act like a princess. In this game your job is to help Mary make progresses and pass the final etiquette tests. Only then she will become a princess. Well, let's get to it and start with the first lesson, how to serve tea. A true princess needs to know how to serve tea gracefully!

Features:
- Hot charming princess game,show your civilization etiquette.
- Tea arts,walking postures,table etiquettes,dress up ,help you design the most beautiful princess
- Elaborate princess etiquette game,help you shape the perfect character
- Exquisite and fluent flash, adorable and fresh drawing
- Simple and clean but very interesting and wonderful background music
